name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Cloud Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a robust skill set in **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, alongside deep expertise in **Snowflake**, **SQL**, and **Data Governance**. My background in networking fundamentals, including TCP/IP, HTTP, and firewalls, ensures I design secure and efficient cloud infrastructure. 
I have hands-on experience in Identity and Access Management (IAM) strategies including RBAC, SAML, OAuth, and MFA to uphold stringent security standards. Additionally, I have implemented security best practices using tools like **AWS KMS**, **Azure Key Vault**, and **GCP KMS**, alongside compliance protocols such as PCI DSS and SOC 2.
My proficiency also extends to full-stack development, utilizing **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Python**, **Node.js**, **React**, **Next.js**, and **Django**. I have successfully led the development of enterprise applications with integrated AI/ML capabilities for predictive analytics and automation. I excel in creating robust, scalable solutions aligned with modern microservices architecture while championing CI/CD automation practices. My familiarity with machine learning pipelines and MLOps using tools such as MLflow and Airflow enhances my ability to deliver data-driven solutions in high-stakes environments.
